resources.string: Emulate NFC Forum Type-4 tag with a NDEF message.\nTo read the message you need a separate reader app running on a second device.
This example emulates a type-4 tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT). It uses an aid-filter F0394148148100 for the APDU SELECT command.
This app reads an NDEF message from an emulated NFC tag. For sending you need a separate sender app running on a second device.

This example expects a class 4 type tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT). It uses an aid-filter F0394148148100 for the APDU SELECT command. When a tag is discovered the data from all pages will be read.
